trans-unit.source: Represents the `<ReferenceList>` element used in XML encryption.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList> class represents the `<ReferenceList>` element of an encrypted document XML signature defined by the XML encryption specification.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList> class contains references to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elements that were encrypted by a key contained within another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList> class uses <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> elements to reference <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> elements, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> elements to reference <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elements.

You can add only <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> objects to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList> collection.
For more information about XML encryption standards, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> class.

Adds a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object to add to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection.
The position at which the new element was inserted.
The value parameter is not a object.
-or-
The value parameter is not a object.
The value parameter is `null`.
Removes all items from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection.

Determines whether the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection contains a specific <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object to locate in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object is found in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection; otherwise, `false`.
Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object to an array, starting at a specified array index.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> object that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
Gets the number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object.
The number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection.
Enumerators allow only reading the data in the collection.
Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to iterate through a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection.
Determines the index of a specific item in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object to locate in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection.
The index of value if found in the collection; otherwise, -1.

Inserts a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection at the specified position.
The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object to insert into the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection.
The value parameter is not a object.
-or-
The value parameter is not a object.
The value parameter is `null`.
Gets a value that indicates whether access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object is synchronized (thread safe).
`true` if access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.
Returns the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object at the specified index.
The index of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object to return.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object at the specified index.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object at the specified index.
The index of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object to return.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object at the specified index.

Removes the first occurrence of a specific <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object to remove from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection.
Removes the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object to remove.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> has a fixed size; otherwise, `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Item(System.Int32)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
The element at the specified index.
index is not a valid index in the .
